Uses of Class
tue.yellow.Patient

    • Uses of Patient in tue.yellow

      Methods in tue.yellow that return Patient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Patient Nurse.getAssignedPatient()
      Gets the assigned patient of this nurse.
      Patient Doctor.getAssignedPatient()
      Gets the assigned patient of this doctor.
      Patient Chair.getAssignedPatient()
      Gets the patient that is assigned to the chair.
      Patient Bed.getAssignedPatient()
      Gets the patient that is assigned to the bed.
      Methods in tue.yellow that return types with arguments of type Patient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Patient> ListTracker.getCallForCheckList()
      Gets the list of all patients that require another check by the nurse
      java.util.List<Patient> ListTracker.getCallNurseList()
      Gets the list of all patients that have called for a nurse
      Methods in tue.yellow with parameters of type Patient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ListTracker.addPatient(Patient patient)
      Adds a patient to the list of all patients
      void Nurse.calmPatient(Patient assignedPatient)
      A nurse will be assigned to the patient in the callNurseList to calm the patient.
      void Nurse.checkOnPatient(Patient assignedPatient, Patient.TriageUrgency urgencyLevel)
      When a patient gets sicker, a nurse will be assigned to this patient to redo triage, as it could happen that the urgency level has changed.
      void Nurse.finishCheck(Patient assignedPatient, Patient.HealthStatus healthStatus)
      Finishes a check and gives a health status to this patient.
      void Nurse.finishTreatment(Patient assignedPatient, Patient.HealthStatus healthStatus)
      Finishes treatment and gives a health status to this patient.
      void Doctor.finishTreatment(Patient assignedPatient, Patient.HealthStatus healthStatus)
      Finishes treatment and gives a health status to this patient.
      void Nurse.finishTriage(Patient assignedPatient, Patient.HealthStatus healthStatus)
      Finishes triage and gives a health status to this patient.
      void Patient.leaveEmergencyRoom(Patient patient)
      Releases a patient from the emergency room.
      void Patient.patientDie(Patient patient)
      In the unfortunate case that a patient dies during his/her stay in the emergency room, this method is called.
      void Nurse.performBloodSampling(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs a Blood Sampling on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performBoarding(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs Boarding on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Doctor.performClinicalExam(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs a Clinical Examination on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performClinicalExam(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs a Clinical Examination on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Doctor.performDischarge(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs a Discharge on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performDischarge(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs a Discharge on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Doctor.performExternalMI(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs an External Medical Imaging on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performExternalMI(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs an External Medical Imaging on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performInternalMI(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs an Internal Medical Imaging on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Doctor.performMedication(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs a Medication on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performMedication(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs a Medication on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Doctor.performOtherExamTreatment(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs an Other Examination and Treatment on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performOtherExamTreatment(Patient assignedPatient, ListTracker lt)
      Performs an Other Examination and Treatment on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performParametersMonitoring(Patient assignedPatient)
      Performs a Parameters Monitoring on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
      void Nurse.performTriage(Patient assignedPatient, Bed.Zone zone, Patient.TriageUrgency urgencyLevel)
      The nurse performs triage on a patient.
      void Nurse.releasePatient(Patient assignedPatient)
      When a treatment or a triage is finished, the patient should not be assigned to the nurse anymore.
      void Doctor.releasePatient(Patient assignedPatient)
      When a treatment is finished, the patient should not be assigned to the doctor anymore.
      void Chair.releasePatient(Patient releasedPatient)
      Removes the patient from the chair.
      void Bed.releasePatient(Patient assignedPatient)
      Removes the patient from the bed.
      void ListTracker.removeCallForCheckList(Patient patient)
      Removes a patient from the list of all patients that require another check by the nurse
      void ListTracker.removeCallNurseList(Patient patient)
      Removes a patient from the list of patients that have called for a nurse
      void Nurse.setAssignedPatient(Patient assignedPatient)
      Assigns the patient to the nurse, if the nurse is not already occupied with another patient.
      void Doctor.setAssignedPatient(Patient assignedPatient)
      Assigns the patient to the doctor, if the doctor is not already occupied with another patient.
      void Chair.setAssignedPatient(Patient assignedPatient)
      Assigns a patient to the chair if the following conditions are met: the patient is currently not assigned to a chair or a bed the chair is currently empty the patient is currently in one of the following states: ENTERED_ER, UNDERGO_TRIAGE, WAITING_FOR_BED
      void Bed.setAssignedPatient(Patient assignedPatient)
      Assigns a patient to the bed if the following conditions are met:
      The patient's zone is the same as the bed's zone The patient's urgency level is the same as the bed's urgency level The bed is currently empty The patient is currently WAITING_FOR_BED
      void ListTracker.setCallForCheckList(Patient patient)
      Adds a patient to the list of all patients that require another check by the nurse
      void ListTracker.setCallNurseList(Patient patient)
      Adds a patient in the list of patients that have called for a nurse
      void Patient.setHealthStatus(Patient patient, Patient.HealthStatus healthStatus)
      Sets the health status of the patient.
